title: ADum mayilODu
sahitya:
Adum mayilODu tigazh arupaDai vIDu tEDi kUDum aDiyar uLLam vADAviDAn vElan


anupallavi

  nADum pala nalam kai kUDa avar pADum pADellAm parandODa pEraruL purivOn


caraNam    ADi ADIk-kudittu kAvaDiyODu tannai nADi vandu kumbiDum bhakta kOTiyar
pADum paNNisaip-pADalaik-kETTadum parivODavar uyyap-paripAlikkum ayyan
